teal.render.geometry

Interface TGeometry


  • public interface TGeometry
    The TGeometry interface defines a general structure for indexed geometry arrays.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.2 $
    Author:
    Andrew McKinney, Phil Bailey, Michael Danziger
